definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: Criteria giving the effective range of the relations are inclu…
sentences.chinese: 文中给出了这些关系式适用范围的判据。

sentences.english: The corresponding equations in general coordinates are also presented though without derivation.
sentences.chinese: 还给出了这些关系式的一般坐标形式，虽然没加引求。
这个关系式有什么意义呢？

sentences.english: Consequently, people may get the relation between seismic interval velocity and displacement pressure.
sentences.chinese: 由此可以推导出地震层速度与排替压力的关系式。

sentences.english: Using the new relationship, some field test piles are computed, and the results are satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 把新关系式应用于现场试桩计算，结果令人满意。

sentences.english: The relationship between the system parameters and the eye pattern opening of the output signal is given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了系统参数与输出信号眼图开启度之间的关系式。

sentences.english: This paper has given magneto -hydrodynamic energy integration relationship at the condition of biadiabatical approximation.
sentences.chinese: 本文得出了双绝热近似的磁流体力学能量积分关系式。

sentences.english: In ionic solutions, the condition of electrical neutrality provides such an additional relation too.
sentences.chinese: 在离子溶液中，电中性条件亦提供了这种附加关系式。

sentences.english: Thus the relations between densities of the solution and concentrations of uranyl nitrate and nitric acid are provided for.
sentences.chinese: 提出了溶液比重和硝酸铀酰与硝酸浓度的关系式。

sentences.english: The relationship between ERP and the enterprise is supplementary to each other.
sentences.chinese: ERP和企业的关系式互为补充的。

sentences.english: The connection between a society's wealth and itsdemographics is cyclical.
sentences.chinese: 社会财富和其人口之间的关系式周期性的。

sentences.english: The relation between the stall and overshoot of speed is found.
sentences.chinese: 对于堵转情况，提出了堵转与超调之间的关系式。

sentences.english: Using a simple method, this paper established a Boltzmann relation on entropy.
sentences.chinese: 本文用一种简单的方法建立了熵的玻尔兹曼关系式。

sentences.english: In this paper, the absolute value problem is disscussed by basic property of absolute value.
sentences.chinese: 利用绝对值基本关系式解决有关绝对值问题。

sentences.english: So this gives you a nice straight line.
sentences.chinese: 这个关系式给了你一个非常漂亮的直线。

sentences.english: The relational expression of natural convective heat transfer of isothermal vertical strip was found.
sentences.chinese: 以条宽为特征量，得出了竖窄条自然对流换热关系式。

definition: discriminant (e.g. b^2-4ac in the formula for the roots of a quadratic equation)
